summary: A look back at Charlie Chaplin's early life and career, from his rough childhood and music hall success in England to his early Hollywood days and the development of his enormously popular "Little Tramp" character.
cast: Peter Hudson|Kate Guyonvarch|David Robinson|Kevin Brownlow|Charles Chaplin|Edna Purviance|Sydney Chaplin|Eric Campbell|Henry Bergman|Max Linder|Mary Pickford|Douglas Fairbanks|Antoine Lange
keywords: music hall|charlie chaplin|little tramp|war bond|movie studio
title: La naissance de Charlot
